long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of going to checkout an item and being shocked at the full price after taxes and shipping are added? Full Price Estimator allows you to easily calculate the potential full price of an item before you reach the checkout.

How It Works:

Choose Your State: Select your state from a dropdown menu to apply the correct sales tax rate.

Choose Item Weight: Input the weight of the item you're purchasing to factor in shipping costs.

Select Shipping Type: Choose from different shipping options (e.g., standard, expedited) to see how it affects the final price.
Get Your Estimate: Instantly see the estimated total price, including tax and shipping.

The price will not be 100% accurate, but it will allow you to get a potential price to reduce sticker shock at checkout.
